metadata.title: CVE-2013-1910 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: yum does not properly handle bad metadata, which allows an attacker tocause a denial of service and possibly have other unspecified impact via aTrojan horse file in the metadata of a remote repository.

criterions.comment: yum: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
